nonZeroPrice: Price must be non zero value

undermaintenance.text: Hi! This page is currently under maintenance and will be back soon!

appsectionnft.title: Trade without platform fees on Artion
appsectionnft.text: Artion is an NFT marketplace built on Fantom. Create and trade NFTs instantly with low network costs.

card1.title: Easy Connect
card1.text: Using Metamask or CoinBase Wallet. Just click 'Connect Wallet' on the top right to start.

card2.title: Super Fast
card2.text: Since Artion runs on the Fantom Opera Network, transactions are usually confirmed within 1-2 seconds.

card3.title: Low Transaction Fees
card3.text: Transactions are usually just a few cents, allowing users to create and trade many NFTs without prohibitively high network fees.

card4.title: Zero Platform Fees
card4.text: Trade NFTs via auction or direct offer without any fees taken by Artion.

collectionregisterform.useOwnerAddressOfCollection: Please submit using the owner address of the collection. If you cannot use the owner address, please email us on contact@fantom.foundation with the information below (and proof of collection ownership, such as from the collection's official email address).
collectionregisterform.alsoBeUsedForNavigation: This image will also be used for navigation. 300x300 recommended.
collectionregisterform.name: Name
collectionregisterform.provideYourDescription: Provide your description for your collection
collectionregisterform.royaltyTooltip: Each NFT under this collection exchanged through Artion will have a percentage of sale given to nominated wallet address.
collectionregisterform.feesTooltip: The nominated Fantom Opera Network wallet address to receive roylties from each sale in this collection.
collectionregisterform.emailTooltip: We will use this email to notify you about your collection aplication. This will not be shared with others.
collectionregisterform.wasntUploaded: Sorry, something went wrong. Data of your token wasn't uploaded:
collectionregisterform.success: The collection registration was requested successfully .

nftcreate.royaltyError: Registering royalty transaction failed. The token was minted, but royalty was not set.

pgDrop.paragraph1: Three unique NFTs redeemable for a race-worn Pierre Gasly helmet, a signed promotion helmet, a VIP experience and three meet and greet.
pgDrop.paragraph2: A limited edition 350 NFTs drop redeemable for signed caps and limited edition T-shirts.
